en: calf rattle made of dried fruit shells

ngiemboon: Te láʼa ńdibe na mmó nyìŋ pɛ́ʼɛ̀.
en: You shouldn't envy someone like that.

ngiemboon: Ambàŋa wɔɔn, ndǐe jʉʼ wé té poŋ.
en: This man, his look is not good.

ngiemboon: Gʉa ńtúʼ ntse gẅie é ne ńdíɛte.
Mé pǔ ńtó tà ńdíndàʼ tàʼ nyìŋ.
en: We all came except one person.
